title: Update regarding GigaTech Inc.
story_body:
GigaTech Inc. (GTX) announced that its Board of Directors has approved the reappointment of Ms. Jane Lee as an Independent Director, effective 2023-02-15 08:00:00 UTC. Ms. Lee will continue to serve on the Audit Committee and Compensation Committee.

In marketing news, GTX launched a new website section dedicated to its corporate social responsibility initiatives, accessible at https://www.gigatech.com/esg. The webpage provides an overview of the company's environmental, social, and governance (ESG) policies and practices.

Separately, GTX announced the completion of its annual employee volunteer program, which took place from 2022-09-01 to 2022-11-30. During this period, GTX employees participated in 25 community service events, contributing a total of 1,200 hours to local charitable organizations.

In other news, GTX reported that it has maintained its ISO 14001:2015 certification for environmental management systems, following a successful surveillance audit conducted by an independent third-party auditor on 2023-01-20.
